vibe_prompt: Create a todo list app with due dates and priority levels, which sould have minimum features : add tasks with title, set due date for tasks, assign priority (high/medium/low), mark tasks complete, delete tasks, filter by priority, sort by due date

user_stories.title: Add Task
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to add a task with a title, due date, and priority level so I can track my to-dos.

user_stories.title: Set Due Date
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to set a due date for tasks to manage deadlines.

user_stories.title: Assign Priority
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to assign priority (high/medium/low) to tasks to focus on important items.

user_stories.title: Mark Complete
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to mark tasks as complete to track progress.

user_stories.title: Delete Task
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to delete tasks to remove unwanted items.

user_stories.title: Filter by Priority
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to filter tasks by priority to view high, medium, or low priority items.

user_stories.title: Sort by Due Date
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to sort tasks by due date to see upcoming deadlines first.

output.frontend_code: Todo List
